mapper.select: SELECT ORD_NO , ACC_NO , ORD_TOTALAMT , ORD_USERD_POINT , ORD_SHIPCOST , ORD_PAYMETHOD , ORD_DATE , REFUND_STATUS , ORD_REQ, ORD_STATUS , ORD_RECPNAME , ORD_RECPADDR , ORD_RECPTEL FROM "ORDER" WHERE ORD_NO =#{ordNo}
select count(*) from "ORDER" o JOIN ACCOUNT AC ON O.ACC_NO = AC.ACC_NO JOIN ORD_DETAIL OD ON O.ORD_NO = OD.ORD_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON OD.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO WHERE O.ord_status = 0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "ORDER" O JOIN ACCOUNT AC ON O.ACC_NO = AC.ACC_NO JOIN ORD_DETAIL OD ON O.ORD_NO = OD.ORD_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON OD.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO WHERE O.ord_status = 0
AND OD.ORD_NO LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND AC.ID LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND O.ORD_RECPNAME LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
ORDER BY O.ORD_DATE DESC

SELECT O.ORD_NO, O.ORD_DATE, OD.ORD_NO AS OD_ORD_NO, P.PROD_NAME, P.FILE_NO, OD.PR_QTY, P.PROD_PRICE, O.ORD_SHIPCOST, O.ORD_STATUS, AC.ID, O.ORD_RECPNAME, O.ORD_TOTALAMT, O.ORD_PAYMETHOD, P.PROD_IMG FROM "ORDER" O JOIN ACCOUNT AC ON O.ACC_NO = AC.ACC_NO JOIN ORD_DETAIL OD ON O.ORD_NO = OD.ORD_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON OD.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO WHERE
OD.ORD_NO LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AC.ID LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
O.ORD_RECPNAME LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
ORDER BY O.ORD_DATE DESC
SELECT P.*, c.comm_code_name, g.grd_accr FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN COMM_CODE C ON P.PROD_CATE_NO = C.COMM_CODE LEFT JOIN GRADE G ON G.GRD_NO = #{grdNo} WHERE PROD_NO = #{prodNo}

SELECT O.ORD_NO as ordNo, D.PROD_NO as prodNo, D.PR_PRICE as ProdPrice, D.PR_QTY as quantity, D.ORD_DATE as ordDate FROM "ORDER" O INNER JOIN ORD_DETAIL D ON O.ORD_NO = D.ORD_NO WHERE O.ORD_STATUS = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OUT_PRODUCT (OP_NO, PROD_NO, OP_PRICE, OP_QTY, OP_DATE) VALUES (out_seq.nextVal, #{prodNo}, #{ProdPrice}, #{quantity}, #{ordDate})
mapper.select: SELECT PROD_NO, SUM(OP_PRICE) AS OP_PRICE, SUM(OP_QTY) AS OP_QTY FROM OUT_PRODUCT WHERE PROD_NO = #{search} GROUP BY PROD_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "ORDER" ( ORD_NO, ACC_NO, ORD_TOTALAMT, ORD_USERD_POINT, ORD_PAYMETHOD, ORD_RECPNAME, ORD_RECPADDR, ORD_RECPTEL, ORD_SHIPNOTICE ) VALUES( #{uid}, #{accNo}, #{totalPrice}, #{usePoint}, #{paymethod}, #{ordRecpName}, #{addr}, #{ordRecptel}, #{ordShipnotice} )
INSERT INTO ORD_DETAIL ( ORD_NO, PROD_NO, PR_PRICE, PR_QTY ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{prodNo}, #{prodPrice}, #{cartQty} )
mapper.select: SELECT O.ORD_NO, O.ORD_TOTALAMT, O.ORD_DATE, od.pr_qty as quantity, O.ORD_STATUS, P.PROD_NAME as productName, P.PROD_IMG, P.PROD_NO FROM "ORDER" O JOIN ORD_DETAIL OD ON O.ORD_NO = OD.ORD_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PROD_NO = OD.PROD_NO WHERE o.acc_no = #{accNo}

SELECT ROWNUM, O.* FROM ( SELECT O.ORD_NO, O.ORD_TOTALAMT, O.ORD_DATE, od.pr_qty as quantity, O.ORD_STATUS, P.PROD_NAME as productName, P.PROD_IMG, P.PROD_NO FROM "ORDER" O JOIN ORD_DETAIL OD ON O.ORD_NO = OD.ORD_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON p.prod_no = od.prod_no WHERE o.acc_no = #{accNo} ORDER BY O.ORD_DATE DESC ) O WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
